home.title: Welcome to Mon financement
home.subtitle: Your trusted partner for non-refundable, concrete financing dedicated to improving family living conditions.
home.featuresSubtitle: Everything you need for a smooth funding application process
home.feature1Desc: Simple multi-step process to submit your funding request
home.feature2Desc: Once granted, the funds are 100% free, non-refundable
home.feature3Desc: Only people in proven situations of precarity or justified need, such as projects of common or personal interest, can benefit.
home.feature4Desc: Critical cases (health, eviction, dependent children...) are treated as a priority.
home.feature5Desc: Only one financing can be granted per person or family over a given period.
home.feature6Desc: All information transmitted through the IDS/IPS system is strictly secured and processed in accordance with current data protection regulations.
home.feature7Desc: Any improper use of funds will result in immediate and irrevocable exclusion from the program.
home.aboutTitle: Solidarity support for all those who feel without a solution
home.aboutDescription: Mon financement is a humanitarian aid program that grants non-refundable financing to people and families in difficulty. We intervene where precarity prevents progress: health, housing, education, projects, family stability... Simple, humane aid, without repayment conditions.
home.about10YearsTitle: For over ten years, we have been working to support the most vulnerable
home.about10YearsDesc: For over 10 years, Mon financement has been working with trusted partners to provide direct, humane, non-refundable aid to people affected by precarity. Each request is handled with seriousness, confidentiality and compassion.
home.teamDescription: Here are some members of our team. Dedicated professionals, offering precise and effective support, and ensuring rigorous analysis of each request
home.statsDescription: Our initiatives are based on verified data, illustrating our commitment, the performance of our operations and concrete results in the field.
home.stat1Desc: of requests already analyzed and processed
home.stat4Desc: According to post-aid feedback from beneficiaries
